welcome_message_body: Welcome to Newington Forest, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and vibrant community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for major airlines such as United and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as JetBlue and Alaska.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
